Table.Name: Class
Table.Description: Contains individual class description for any detection in the field F287

Column.Name: classID
Column.Description: Classification flag

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: Image Type, eg. "non-stellar", "stellar"...

Table.Name: SourceXDetection
Table.Description: Cross-neighbours between F287 Source and Detection tables

Column.Name: masterObjID
Column.Description: The object identifier from the Source table

Column.Name: slaveObjID
Column.Description: The object identifier from the Detection table

Column.Name: distanceMins
Column.Description: The angular separation of the cross-neighbour

Table.Name: Source
Table.Description: Contains merged sources for the set of UBRI stacks in the F287

Column.Name: objID
Column.Description: Unique identifier of merged source

Column.Name: objIDU
Column.Description: objID for U band stack detection merged into this object

Column.Name: objIDB
Column.Description: objID for B band stack detection merged into this object

Column.Name: objIDR
Column.Description: objID for R band stack detection merged into this object

Column.Name: objIDI
Column.Description: objID for I band stack detection merged into this object

Column.Name: htmId
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (20-deep) of centroid

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Mean RA, computed from detections merged in this catalogue

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Mean Dec, computed from detections merged in this catalogue

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: Cartesian x of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: Cartesian y of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: Cartesian z of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

Column.Name: classMagU
Column.Description: U band colour-corrected magnitude selected by U image class

Column.Name: classMagB
Column.Description: B band colour-corrected magnitude selected by B image class

Column.Name: classMagR
Column.Description: R band colour-corrected magnitude selected by R image class

Column.Name: classMagI
Column.Description: I band colour-corrected magnitude selected by I image class

Column.Name: gCorMagU
Column.Description: U band colour-corrected magnitude assuming object is galaxy

Column.Name: gCorMagB
Column.Description: B band colour-corrected magnitude assuming object is galaxy

Column.Name: gCorMagR
Column.Description: R band colour-corrected magnitude assuming object is galaxy

Column.Name: gCorMagI
Column.Description: I band colour-corrected magnitude assuming object is galaxy

Column.Name: sCorMagU
Column.Description: U band colour-corrected magnitude assuming object is star

Column.Name: sCorMagB
Column.Description: B band colour-corrected magnitude assuming object is star

Column.Name: sCorMagR
Column.Description: R band colour-corrected magnitude assuming object is star

Column.Name: sCorMagI
Column.Description: I band colour-corrected magnitude assuming object is star

Column.Name: meanClass
Column.Description: Discrete image class code based on ranges of meanClassStat

Column.Name: meanClassStat
Column.Description: N(0,1) sum of available individual stack profile statistics, prfStat

Column.Name: classU
Column.Description: Image classification from U band detection

Column.Name: classB
Column.Description: Image classification from B band detection

Column.Name: classR
Column.Description: Image classification from R band detection

Column.Name: classI
Column.Description: Image classification from I band detection

Column.Name: ellipU
Column.Description: Ellipticity of U band detection

Column.Name: ellipB
Column.Description: Ellipticity of B band detection

Column.Name: ellipR
Column.Description: Ellipticity of R band detection

Column.Name: ellipI
Column.Description: Ellipticity of I band detection

Column.Name: qualU
Column.Description: Bitwise quality flag from U band detection

Column.Name: qualB
Column.Description: Bitwise quality flag from B band detection

Column.Name: qualR
Column.Description: Bitwise quality flag from R band detection

Column.Name: qualI
Column.Description: Bitwise quality flag from I band detection

Column.Name: blendU
Column.Description: Blend flag from U band detection

Column.Name: blendB
Column.Description: Blend flag from B band detection

Column.Name: blendR
Column.Description: Blend flag from R band detection

Column.Name: blendI
Column.Description: Blend flag from I band detection

Column.Name: prfStatU
Column.Description: Profile statistic from U band detection

Column.Name: prfStatB
Column.Description: Profile statistic from B band detection

Column.Name: prfStatR
Column.Description: Profile statistic from R band detection

Column.Name: prfStatI
Column.Description: Profile statistic from I band detection

Column.Name: meansCorMagU
Column.Description: Mean colour-corrected stellar U magnitude over available epochs

Column.Name: sigsCorMagU
Column.Description: Standard deviation on meansCorMagU

Column.Name: madsCorMagU
Column.Description: Median absolute deviation on meansCorMagU

Column.Name: skewsCorMagU
Column.Description: Skewness of the distribution of sCorMagU

Column.Name: meangCorMagU
Column.Description: Mean colour-corrected galaxian U magnitude over available epochs

Column.Name: siggCorMagU
Column.Description: Standard deviation on meangCorMagU

Column.Name: madgCorMagU
Column.Description: Median absolute deviation on meangCorMagU

Column.Name: skewgCorMagU
Column.Description: Skewness of the distribution of gCorMagU

Column.Name: numObsU
Column.Description: Number of observations available in U band

Column.Name: meansCorMagB
Column.Description: Mean colour-corrected stellar B magnitude over available epochs

Column.Name: sigsCorMagB
Column.Description: Standard deviation on meansCorMagB

Column.Name: madsCorMagB
Column.Description: Median absolute deviation on meansCorMagB

Column.Name: skewsCorMagB
Column.Description: Skewness of the distribution of sCorMagB

Column.Name: meangCorMagB
Column.Description: Mean colour-corrected galaxian B magnitude over available epochs

Column.Name: siggCorMagB
Column.Description: Standard deviation on meangCorMagB

Column.Name: madgCorMagB
Column.Description: Median absolute deviation on meangCorMagB

Column.Name: skewgCorMagB
Column.Description: Skewness of the distribution of gCorMagB

Column.Name: numObsB
Column.Description: Number of observations available in B band

Column.Name: meansCorMagR
Column.Description: Mean colour-corrected stellar R magnitude over available epochs

Column.Name: sigsCorMagR
Column.Description: Standard deviation on meansCorMagR

Column.Name: madsCorMagR
Column.Description: Median absolute deviation on meansCorMagR

Column.Name: skewsCorMagR
Column.Description: Skewness of the distribution of sCorMagR

Column.Name: meangCorMagR
Column.Description: Mean colour-corrected galaxian R magnitude over available epochs

Column.Name: siggCorMagR
Column.Description: Standard deviation on meangCorMagR

Column.Name: madgCorMagR
Column.Description: Median absolute deviation on meangCorMagR

Column.Name: skewgCorMagR
Column.Description: Skewness of the distribution of gCorMagR

Column.Name: numObsR
Column.Description: Number of observations available in R band

Column.Name: meansCorMagI
Column.Description: Mean colour-corrected stellar I magnitude over available epochs

Column.Name: sigsCorMagI
Column.Description: Standard deviation on meansCorMagI

Column.Name: madsCorMagI
Column.Description: Median absolute deviation on meansCorMagI

Column.Name: skewsCorMagI
Column.Description: Skewness of the distribution of sCorMagI

Column.Name: meangCorMagI
Column.Description: Mean colour-corrected galaxian I magnitude over available epochs

Column.Name: siggCorMagI
Column.Description: Standard deviation on meangCorMagI

Column.Name: madgCorMagI
Column.Description: Median absolute deviation on meangCorMagI

Column.Name: skewgCorMagI
Column.Description: Skewness of the distribution of gCorMagI

Column.Name: numObsI
Column.Description: Number of observations available in I band

Column.Name: variableClass
Column.Description: Classification of objects. -1 non-variable, 1 variable, -3 prob variable, -2 prob non-variable, -9 not measured

Column.Name: masterObjID
Column.Description: The object identifier from the Source table

Column.Name: slaveObjID
Column.Description: The object identifier from the Source table

Column.Name: distanceMins
Column.Description: The angular separation of the cross-neighbour

Table.Name: KnownQSO
Table.Description: Contains quasar sources obtained from the VII/258

Column.Name: qsoID
Column.Description: Unique identifier for each QSO assigned in the SVS

Column.Name: radioDetect
Column.Description: Detected in radio (0=no; 1=yes)

Column.Name: name
Column.Description: Most common name

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: RA (J2000.0) of the source

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Dec (J2000.0) of the source

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: Cartesian x of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: Cartesian y of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: Cartesian z of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

Column.Name: htmId
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (20-deep) of centroid

Column.Name: posCode
Column.Description: Position code: A=approximate, O=optical, R=radio (O,R have accuracy better than 1 arcsec)

Column.Name: flux6cm
Column.Description: Flux in the 6cm (5GHz) band

Column.Name: refFlux6cm
Column.Description: Reference for flux6cm

Column.Name: flux20cm
Column.Description: Flux in the 20cm (1.4GHz) band

Column.Name: refFlux20cm
Column.Description: Reference for flux20cm

Column.Name: zMethod
Column.Description: Limit (<) or method flag (*=measured by slitless spectrscopy) on z

Column.Name: z
Column.Description: Spectroscopic redshift

Column.Name: spClass
Column.Description: Spectroscopic classification

Column.Name: typeVmag
Column.Description: Type of photometry of vMag (*=photographic; B=blue; R=red; I,J or K=infrared; O=photographic O or J)

Column.Name: vMag
Column.Description: Apparent magnitude in passband typeVmag

Column.Name: bmv
Column.Description: Colour index (B-V)

Column.Name: umb
Column.Description: Colour index (U-B)

Column.Name: absMag
Column.Description: Absolute magnitude (H_0=50 km/s/Mpc; q_0=0)

Column.Name: refChart
Column.Description: Finder chart reference

Column.Name: refMags
Column.Description: Reference for the photometry

Column.Name: refZ
Column.Description: Reference for the redshift

Column.Name: raDec1950
Column.Description: Sexagesimal RA/Dec at equinox B1950.0

Table.Name: Plate
Table.Description: Contains information about each plate measurement used in the F287 survey

Column.Name: plateNum
Column.Description: Unique plate number assigned by UK Schmidt Telescope Unit (NB: 1,2,3 or 4 = deep stack in U,B,R or I)

Column.Name: dateMeas
Column.Description: Measurement date

Column.Name: timeMeas
Column.Description: Measurement time (local), eg. 15:33:47

Column.Name: instrument
Column.Description: Name of scanning machine

Column.Name: softVersion
Column.Description: Software version, eg. /home/scosdev/v033

Column.Name: operator
Column.Description: Machine operator's username

Column.Name: scanMaterial
Column.Description: Photographic medium, eg. Original glass, Copy film, Copy glass

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: Unique filter identification number

Column.Name: raPnt
Column.Description: Mean plate centre RA

Column.Name: decPnt
Column.Description: Mean plate centre Dec

Column.Name: radecSys
Column.Description: Co-ordinate system of raPnt/decPnt, eg. FK4

Column.Name: equinox
Column.Description: Equinox of raPnt and decPnt

Column.Name: eqTsys
Column.Description: Time system of equinox, eg. BESSELIAN

Column.Name: utDateObs
Column.Description: UT date of observation

Column.Name: lstObs
Column.Description: Local sidereal time at start of exposure, eg. 2336

Column.Name: expLength
Column.Description: Exposure time

Column.Name: epoch
Column.Description: Epoch of observation

Column.Name: domeTemp
Column.Description: Dome temp at observation

Column.Name: domePressure
Column.Description: Dome pressure at observation

Column.Name: domeHumid
Column.Description: Dome relative humidity at obsevation time

Column.Name: tropl
Column.Description: Tropospheric lapse rate

Column.Name: mjd
Column.Description: Modified Julian Date at mid exposure

Column.Name: focusNX
Column.Description: No. of scan focus points in X

Column.Name: focusNY
Column.Description: No. of scan focus points in Y

Column.Name: calType
Column.Description: Intensity calibration wedge fit type, eg. SPLINE

Column.Name: stepWdg
Column.Description: Intensity calibration step-wedge type, eg. kpno

Column.Name: nSteps
Column.Description: No. of intensity calibration wedge steps

Column.Name: orientation
Column.Description: SuperCOSMOS plate orientation, eg. news

Column.Name: emulpos
Column.Description: SuperCOSMOS emulsion position, eg. up

Column.Name: sosp
Column.Description: SuperCOSMOS start of scan CCD pixel number

Column.Name: stepsize
Column.Description: SuperCOSMOS nominal pixel size

Column.Name: scanlen
Column.Description: SuperCOSMOS CCD lane scan length

Column.Name: aXmin
Column.Description: SuperCOSMOS XMIN of measured area

Column.Name: aXmax
Column.Description: SuperCOSMOS XMAX of measured area

Column.Name: aYmin
Column.Description: SuperCOSMOS YMIN of measured area

Column.Name: aYmax
Column.Description: SuperCOSMOS YMAX of measured area

Column.Name: xPnt
Column.Description: Centre of scan area in X

Column.Name: yPnt
Column.Description: Centre of scan area in Y

Column.Name: areaCut
Column.Description: Minimum area of detected object

Column.Name: apParam
Column.Description: Areal profile parameter

Column.Name: dbParam
Column.Description: Deblending parameter

Column.Name: dbAmin
Column.Description: Minimum area of parent image that can be deblended

Column.Name: dbAmax
Column.Description: Maximum area of parent image that can be deblended

Column.Name: dbAcut
Column.Description: Minimum area of deblended object detection

Column.Name: dbLevel
Column.Description: No. of rethresholding levels for deblending

Column.Name: skySquare
Column.Description: Blocksize (one side) of sky background

Column.Name: skyDefn
Column.Description: Method of defining sky, eg. "median"

Column.Name: skyFilter
Column.Description: Box filter weights for sky determination

Column.Name: fThresh
Column.Description: Sky filtering parameter

Column.Name: fSclen
Column.Description: Scale size for iterative filter application

Column.Name: pCut
Column.Description: Threshold "percentage cut" for pixel analysis

Column.Name: starCat
Column.Description: Name of reference star catalogue used for astrometric fit

Column.Name: brightLim
Column.Description: Bright mag limit for selected astrometric refstars

Column.Name: faintLim
Column.Description: Faint limit for selected refstars

Column.Name: equinRef
Column.Description: Equinox of refstar positions

Column.Name: tSysRef
Column.Description: Time system of equinox of refstar positions, eg. JULIAN

Column.Name: maxIter
Column.Description: Maximum no. of iterations for non-linear astrometric fit

Column.Name: rCritIni
Column.Description: Initial matching tolerance for refstars

Column.Name: rCritAbs
Column.Description: Absolute object rejection criterion

Column.Name: rCritRel
Column.Description: Relative object rejection criterion

Column.Name: rCritFin
Column.Description: Final residual tolerance

Column.Name: distType
Column.Description: Radial distortion term in solution, eg. R/TAN(R)

Column.Name: scdGrid
Column.Description: Non-linear distortion mask filename

Column.Name: raCol
Column.Description: Name of RA column in reference catalogue

Column.Name: decCol
Column.Description: Name of Dec column in reference catalogue

Column.Name: raPMCol
Column.Description: Name of RA proper motion column in reference catalogue

Column.Name: decPMCol
Column.Description: Name of Dec proper motion column in reference catalogue

Column.Name: plxCol
Column.Description: Name of parallax column in reference catalogue

Column.Name: rvCol
Column.Description: Name of radial velocity column in reference catalogue

Column.Name: magCol
Column.Description: Name of magnitude column in reference catalogue

Column.Name: cEquinox
Column.Description: Catalogue equinox

Column.Name: cEqTSys
Column.Description: Catalogue equinox time system, eg. JULIAN

Column.Name: cEpoch
Column.Description: Catalogue epoch

Column.Name: cEpTSys
Column.Description: Catalogue epoch time system, eg. JULIAN

Column.Name: starsInit
Column.Description: No. of refstars in initial astrometric solution

Column.Name: starsSelec
Column.Description: No. of refstars initially selected

Column.Name: starsUsed
Column.Description: No. of refstars in final astrometric solution

Column.Name: coeffs1
Column.Description: 1st coefficient of astrometric fit for XY to obs. xi,eta

Column.Name: coeffs2
Column.Description: 2nd coefficient of astrometric fit for XY to obs. xi,eta

Column.Name: coeffs3
Column.Description: 3rd coefficient of astrometric fit for XY to obs. xi,eta

Column.Name: coeffs4
Column.Description: 4th coefficient of astrometric fit for XY to obs. xi,eta

Column.Name: coeffs5
Column.Description: 5th coefficient of astrometric fit for XY to obs. xi,eta

Column.Name: coeffs6
Column.Description: 6th coefficient of astrometric fit for XY to obs. xi,eta

Column.Name: cubicDist
Column.Description: Cubic coefficient of radial distortion

Column.Name: obsRaPnt
Column.Description: Observed plate centre RA

Column.Name: obsDecPnt
Column.Description: Observed plate centre Dec

Column.Name: shiftPnt
Column.Description: Shift of from nominal to fitted plate centre

Column.Name: areaMin
Column.Description: Minimum object area in IAM file

Column.Name: areaMax
Column.Description: Maximum object area in IAM file

Column.Name: magMin
Column.Description: Minimum instrumental mag in IAM file

Column.Name: magMax
Column.Description: Maximum instrumental mag in IAM file

Column.Name: ellipMin
Column.Description: Minimum object ellipticity in IAM file

Column.Name: ellipMax
Column.Description: Maximum object ellipticity in IAM file

Column.Name: ellipMode
Column.Description: Modal object ellipticity in IAM file

Column.Name: orientMode
Column.Description: Modal orientation in IAM file

Column.Name: ellipMed
Column.Description: Median ellipticity in IAM file

Column.Name: orientMed
Column.Description: Median orientation in IAM file

Column.Name: ellipMean
Column.Description: Mean object ellipticity in IAM file

Column.Name: orientMean
Column.Description: Mean orientation in IAM file

Column.Name: objNum
Column.Description: No. of objects detected on plate

Column.Name: nParents
Column.Description: No. of parent objects detected on plate

Column.Name: lane1Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 1 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane2Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 2 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane3Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 3 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane4Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 4 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane5Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 5 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane6Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 6 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane7Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 7 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane8Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 8 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane9Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 9 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane10Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 10 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane11Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 11 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane12Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 12 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane13Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 13 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane14Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 14 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane15Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 15 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane16Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 16 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane17Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 17 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane18Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 18 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane19Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 19 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane20Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 20 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane21Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 21 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane22Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 22 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane23Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 23 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane24Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 24 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane25Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 25 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane26Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 26 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane27Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 27 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane28Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 28 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane29Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 29 of plate scan

Column.Name: lane30Count
Column.Description: No. of objects in lane 30 of plate scan

Column.Name: astResidX
Column.Description: Residual of astrometric fit in X

Column.Name: astResidY
Column.Description: Residual of astrometric fit in Y

Column.Name: nCalCoeffs
Column.Description: No. of photometric calibration coefficients

Column.Name: CalXK
Column.Description: Stationary point in profile cal. curve

Column.Name: gradient
Column.Description: Gradient of linear portion of profile cal. curve

Column.Name: getCal1
Column.Description: 1st profile calibration polynomial coefficient

Column.Name: getCal2
Column.Description: 2nd profile calibration polynomial coefficient

Column.Name: getCal3
Column.Description: 3rd profile calibration polynomial coefficient

Column.Name: getCal4
Column.Description: 4th profile calibration polynomial coefficient

Column.Name: getCal5
Column.Description: 5th profile calibration polynomial coefficient

Column.Name: getCal6
Column.Description: 6th profile calibration polynomial coefficient

Column.Name: ffZp
Column.Description: Field-to-field zeropoint

Column.Name: galZp
Column.Description: Zeropoint of galaxy instrumental scale

Column.Name: galGrad
Column.Description: Gradient of galaxy instrumental mag scale

Column.Name: directory
Column.Description: Name of directory in flat-file system of source data.

Table.Name: Detection
Table.Description: Contains individual detections for every plate and stack in the field F287

Column.Name: objID
Column.Description: Unique object identification number (combination of plateNum and recNum)

Column.Name: plateNum
Column.Description: Plate ID of the plate that this detection came from

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: Unique filter identification number

Column.Name: parentID
Column.Description: objID of parent object, = objID for parent/undeblended (ie. not child) object

Column.Name: recNum
Column.Description: The record number in the original IAM file

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Celestial Right Ascension

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Celestial Declination

Column.Name: htmId
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (20-deep) of centroid

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: Cartesian x of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: Cartesian y of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: Cartesian z of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

Column.Name: xmin
Column.Description: Leftmost extent of image on plate

Column.Name: xmax
Column.Description: Rightmost extent of image on plate

Column.Name: ymin
Column.Description: Bottommost extent of image on plate

Column.Name: ymax
Column.Description: Topmost extent of image on plate

Column.Name: area
Column.Description: Area within detection isophote

Column.Name: ipeak
Column.Description: Intensity of brightest pixel above sky

Column.Name: cosmag
Column.Description: Isophotal magnitude

Column.Name: isky
Column.Description: Estimate of sky intensity at (xCen, yCen)

Column.Name: xCen
Column.Description: Intensity-weighted X-centroid of image

Column.Name: yCen
Column.Description: Intensity-weighted Y-centroid of image

Column.Name: aU
Column.Description: Semi-major axis of unweighted fitted ellipse

Column.Name: bU
Column.Description: Semi-minor axis of unweighted fitted ellipse

Column.Name: thetaU
Column.Description: Position angle (wrt x-axis) of unweighted fitted ellipse

Column.Name: aI
Column.Description: Semi-major axis of intensity-weighted fitted ellip.

Column.Name: bI
Column.Description: Semi-minor axis of intensity-weighted fitted ellip.

Column.Name: thetaI
Column.Description: Position angle (wrt x-axis) of intensity-weighted fitted ellipse

Column.Name: class
Column.Description: Classification flag

Column.Name: pa
Column.Description: Celestial position angle (E of N)

Column.Name: ap1
Column.Description: Area above 1st areal profile threshold

Column.Name: ap2
Column.Description: Area above 2nd areal profile threshold

Column.Name: ap3
Column.Description: Area above 3rd areal profile threshold

Column.Name: ap4
Column.Description: Area above 4th areal profile threshold

Column.Name: ap5
Column.Description: Area above 5th areal profile threshold

Column.Name: ap6
Column.Description: Area above 6th areal profile threshold

Column.Name: ap7
Column.Description: Area above 7th areal profile threshold

Column.Name: ap8
Column.Description: Area above 8th areal profile threshold

Column.Name: blend
Column.Description: Deblend flag: -n=parent of n children; +n = nth child of a parent

Column.Name: quality
Column.Description: Bitwise quality flag

Column.Name: prfStat
Column.Description: Profile statistic

Column.Name: prfMag
Column.Description: Profile magnitude

Column.Name: gMag
Column.Description: Magnitude calculated on assumption object is galaxy

Column.Name: sMag
Column.Description: Magnitude calculated on assumption object is star

Column.Name: gCorMag
Column.Description: Colour-corrected magnitude calculated on assumption object is galaxy

Column.Name: sCorMag
Column.Description: Colour-corrected magnitude calculated on assumption object is star

Table.Name: SourceXKnownQSO
Table.Description: Cross-neighbours between F287 Source objects and the table of known QSOs

Column.Name: masterObjID
Column.Description: The object identifier from the F287 Source table

Column.Name: slaveObjID
Column.Description: The object identifier (qsoID) from F287.KnownQSO

Column.Name: distanceMins
Column.Description: The angular separation of the cross-neighbour

Table.Name: Quality
Table.Description: Contains information about the quality of an F287 detection

Column.Name: bitSet
Column.Description: Bits which signify the existance of particular events if set to 1

Column.Name: increment
Column.Description: Decimal increment corresponding to the bit set

Column.Name: event
Column.Description: Descriptions of the events

Column.Name: severity
Column.Description: Classifications of the events

Column.Name: comments
Column.Description: Detailed information about the events
